00357         {
00358         public:
00359             ReceiverThread( LocalNode* localNode ) : _localNode( localNode ){}
00360             virtual bool init()
00361                 {
00362                     setDebugName( std::string( "Rcv " ) +
00363                         co::base::className( _localNode ));
00364                     return _localNode->_commandThread->start();

00409         class CommandThread : public co::base::Thread
00410         {
00411         public:
00412             CommandThread( LocalNode* localNode ) : _localNode( localNode ){}
00413             virtual bool init()
00414                 {
00415                     setDebugName( std::string( "Cmd " ) +
00416                                   co::base::className( _localNode ));
00417                     return true;
00418                 }
00419             virtual void run(){ _localNode->_runCommandThread(); }
00420         private:
